channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 15:29Tue, Dec 21, 2021 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: 17 MLAs to 2: Congress in Goa left stunned, betrayed
item.description: After emerging as the single largest party at the 2017 assembly polls with 17 MLAs, Congress has seen its strength gradually reduce and is now down to two legislators in the House following Curtorim MLA Aleixo Reginaldo Lourencos sudden resignation on Monday. Lourenco is the second Congress MLA to desert the party in the past few days.

item.title: Live: PM transfers Rs 1k cr in bank a/cs of various SHGs
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday attended a programme in Prayagraj to promote women empowerment and transferred Rs 1,000 crore to the bank accounts of self-help groups benefiting 16 lakh women. Stay with TOI for all the latest updates:

item.title: Live: RS passes electoral reforms Bill via voice vote
item.description: Opposition parties on Tuesday took out a protest march demanding dismissal of Union minister Ajay Mishra whose son has been arrested in the Lakhimpur Kheri violence case. The Winter Session of Parliament is scheduled to culminate on December 23. Stay here for more updates:

item.title: Live: For first time, 2 Omicron cases detected in Odisha
item.description: Amid a rising concern over Omicron, pharma major Moderna has said that a booster dose of its Covid vaccine is effective against the variant. Indian pharma company Bharat Biotech meanwhile has sought approval for phase-3 trials of its intranasal vaccine. Stay here for the latest updates:

item.title: Ashes cricket tests every part of your game: Gillespie
item.description: Former Australian cricketer Jason Gillespie, who took over 400 international wickets in his career across all three formats, was a guest on Times of India's sports podcast - Sportscast - recently and spoke about what it really means to be a part of an Ashes battle. It is after all cricket's oldest rivalry.

item.title: Drugs case: FIR lodged against SAD MLA Bikram Majithia
item.description: Punjab police on Monday night registered an FIR against the Shiromani Akali Dal (SAD) MLA Bikram Singh Majithia in connection with drugs case.

item.title: Cool gadgets under Rs 1,000 you can buy as Christmas gifts
Golden Temple sacrilege bid: 2 days on, lynched man not identified
item.description: Police have so far not been able to ascertain the identity of the person who committed sacrilege in the sanctum sanctorum of Golden Temple on December 18 evening.

item.title: How Instagram 'became' more like TikTok in 2021
Bill to increase marriage age for women introduced in LS
item.description: A bill that seeks to have a uniform age of marriage for men and women was introduced in Lok Sabha on Tuesday amid protests by opposition members, with Union minister Smriti Irani urging the chair to refer it to a parliamentary panel.

item.title: Apple begins iPhone 13 production in India
What to do if vaccines fail to prevent Omicron?
item.description: Coronavirus vaccines came at the time when the entire world was battling the implications of the SARs-COV-2 virus. They proved to be a boon during the most uncertain times and many continue to place their trust in the same.

item.title: Kolkata civic poll results live: TMC wins 13 wards, leads in 112
item.description: Counting of votes for Kolkata Municipal Corporation (KMC) elections has begun as the results are to be declared on Tuesday. Netaji Indoor Stadium has been made the counting centre where the exercise is being carried out amid tight security. Elections for all 144 wards of KMC took place at 4,959 polling booths on Sunday. Stay with TOI for all updates

item.title: Corona Letter: Can you be infected with two variants at once?
Covid-19: Omicron variant in circulation in Karnataka for a month now
item.description: Omicron has been in circulation in the state for a month and 19 people have been infected by the SARS-CoV2 variant of concern till date. Omicrons trail has been found in six districts of Karnataka: Bengaluru (8 cases), Belagavi (1), Dakshina Kannada (6), Udupi (2), Shivamogga (1) and Dharwad (1). In all, India has reported 170 Omicron cases.

item.title: Four SA players to watch out for in India vs SA Test series
item.description: South Africa are going to play their first Test series in over six months when they host India in a three-match series starting with the Boxing Day Test at SuperSport Park in Centurion. A successful away series in June this year, a 2-0 victory against West Indies, was their last Test assignment.

item.title: 200 cases of Omicron detected in India so far: Health ministry
item.description: Maharashtra and Delhi have recorded 54 cases of Omicron variant each, while Telangana registered 20 cases, Karnataka 19, Rajasthan 18, Kerala 15 and Gujarat 14 cases.

item.title: Rakhi's husband on first wife's accusations: She is playing the woman card
item.description: Bigg Boss 15 contestant Rakhi Sawant's husband Ritesh courted controversy as soon as he entered the show. After he entered the house with Rakhi Sawant and made a public appearance on national television, his estranged wife Snigdha Priya came out and levelled some serious allegations against him. She not only claimed that Ritesh is faking to be an NRI but also accused him of domestic violence. In an explosive interview to BT she stated that Ritesh is still her husband and married to her and she was shocked to see him on Bigg Boss 15 posing as Rakhi Sawant's husband. Snigdha further shared that she had filed a case of domestic violence against him in April 2017. Now, in an exclusive interview with ETimes TV, Rakhi's husband Ritesh after getting evicted from BB 15, spoke at length about all the allegations levelled against by his wife Snigdha and in fact accussed his wife of having an affair, playing the woman card and more. He also spoke about his rude behaviour with Rakhi Sawant on national television. Ritesh claimed that if everything goes well, he will legally get married to Rakhi by 2022.
